Text: Oops, one file is labelled as a 1994 paper when it is from 2004 - sorry, my bad. The file "1994 Combinations of Natural and Anthropogenic Forcings in Twentieth-Century Climate.pdf" is from 2004.

Thanks very much bwt, this is great! There are so few scientific papers here, and most readers don't even check whether references exist! If they did, they'd immediately be able to discount so much right-wing literature  including Coulter, 'Bishop Hill', Wegman,  Peiser....

...'Bishop Hill' being the blog name of one Mr. Montford...

http://www.realclimate.org/index.php/archives/2010/07/the-montford-delusion/
